attributes.action: introduce a nationalistic day in which we can celebrate the quality of Britain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This country is slowly but steadily losing its national identity, an identity which we should be proud of, as we have been a leading power in this world for centuries, and I for one am not prepared to give this up. We must fly the flag with pride, and celebrate the historical, cultural and even the trivial achievements our Britain has made! Small things such as respecting traditions, learning about inspirational figures and even learning things about British music and literature and film, are all progressions that could and should be made! Help others learn to love our country and sign!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
